text: Heorhiy Kryuchkov (; 20 October 1929 â€“ 4 November 2021) was a Ukrainian politician. He was a member of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and later the Communist Party of Ukraine. He was in the Verkhovna Rada from 1998 to 2006. Kryuchkov was born in Bilmak Raion, Ukrainian SSR, Soviet Union. Kryuchkov died on 4 November 2021 in Kyiv, Ukraine at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada
title: Heorhiy Kryuchkov
